title: Fuji New Grand Hotel, Lake Yamanaka

description: large white hotel situated in grove of trees with loop-around driveway in foreground; large lake with shoreline and road in middle ground; rising, snow-covered Mt. Fuji in background
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
